hexgender.entry.transition_spells.entry: I would occasionally wonder what being born another sex would have been like...$(br)So, with a helping hand from the biomancy corps, I have made a few spells which would allow for instant transitions between sexes!
hexgender.page.transition_spells.female_: Transitions the caster to a female!$(br)I wonder how I'd look in a skirt...
hexgender.page.transition_spells.male_tr: Transitions the caster to a male!$(br)No more periods!
hexgender.page.transition_spells.other_t: Transitions the caster to androgynous!$(br)Hmm... this is... interesting...
hexgender.page.transition_spells.get_gen: Obtains the target's selected gender as an ordinal (number)
hexgender.entry.bust_patterns.entry: With the newfound transition spells I began to wonder if I could change the properties of my chest. With more help from the biomancy corps, I have developed patterns to do just that... within reason.
hexgender.page.bust_patterns.get_bust_si: Gives the bust size of the target
hexgender.page.bust_patterns.set_bust_si: Sets the bust size of the caster
hexgender.page.bust_patterns.get_bouncin: Gives the bounciness of the target's breasts
hexgender.page.bust_patterns.set_bouncin: Sets the bounciness of the caster's breasts
hexgender.page.bust_patterns.get_floppin: Gives the floppiness of the target's breasts
hexgender.page.bust_patterns.set_floppin: Sets the floppiness of the caster's breasts
hexgender.page.bust_patterns.get_physics: Gives the physics of the target's breasts
hexgender.page.bust_patterns.set_physics: Sets the physics of the caster's breasts
hexgender.page.bust_patterns.get_cleavag: Gets the cleavage of the target's breasts
hexgender.page.bust_patterns.set_cleavag: Sets the cleavage of the caster's breasts
hexgender.page.bust_patterns.get_breast_: Gets the offset of the target's breasts
hexgender.page.bust_patterns.set_breast_: Sets the offset of the caster's breasts
hexgender.page.bust_patterns.get_uniboob: Gets whether the target's breasts are a uniboob
hexgender.page.bust_patterns.set_uniboob: Sets whether the caster's breasts are a uniboob
